ygData.subject: RE: New Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Bree, I dont know if I really agree with you, I mean with this type of program, we are beta testers, we will always be beta testers as long as we play this
ygData.messageBody:
Bree,

I dont know if I really agree with you, I mean with this type of program, we
are beta testers, we will always be beta testers as long as we play this
type of game. As a programmer myself I know that some bugs just slip by and
there is not a damn thing you can do until something pops up. And you cant
always just drop what you are doing and fix it right way.

I am not saying what they did is fair, or anything like that. I just
understand how some changes might/are totally legit.

As for other 100% reduction items... I dont know of any. I know of 2 75%
ones, but that is about it.

Jaxim



>From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] New Patch
>Date: Tue, 14 Sep 1999 16:46:49 EDT
>
>From: "Heather Daley" <blushn@...>
>
>Jaxim,
>
>there are many very powerful items in the game and there are other
>containers that reduce weight 100%, not a real big deal actually, they are
>lore so it not like you can stock up on them. We are not Beta testers,
>these problems with "code" supposedly, should have been fixed a long time
>ago. Them saying "there was an erorr in the code" is a scape goat that they
>use to justify screwing with us, just like when they reduced the amount of
>damage our DD spell, retribution does.
>
>Bree
>
>
>>From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>
>>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] New Patch
>>Date: Tue, 14 Sep 1999 11:55:15 PDT
>>
>>From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>
>>
>>well with this I can believe it.. I mean come on folks... an item that
>>redueces all weight??? a tad powerful if ya ask me..
>>
>>Jaxim
>>
>>
>>

>>>

>>>there was an error in the database which has now been fixed."
>>>
>>>Elbeno
